entityData.name: Spark Slinger
entityData.description: A flying drone that zips around the battlefield and electrifies enemies below with its powerful shocks. With lightning-fast reflexes and pinpoint accuracy, this little bot is a force to be reckoned with.
entityData.title: Jhonatan Goblin

entityData.name: Bomb Buddy
entityData.description: A compact robot with a big arsenal, this little guy packs a punch with his grenade-throwing abilities. Whether you need to clear a path or take out a group of enemies, the Bomb Buddy has you covered. Just be sure to give him plenty of space when he starts tossing those explosives around!
entityData.title: Jhonatan Goblin

entityData.name: Dead-Eye Drone
entityData.description: A sleek drone that excels at long-range combat, taking out enemies from afar with deadly accuracy. Equipped with powerful sniper rifles and advanced targeting systems, the Dead-Eye Drone is the perfect companion for any marksman.
entityData.title: Jhonatan Goblin

entityData.name: Boom-Box Bot
entityData.description: A heavy-duty robot that scours the battlefield for enemy targets, dropping landmines along its path to create a deadly obstacle course. With its rugged exterior and explosive arsenal, the Boom-Box Bot is a force to be reckoned with.
entityData.title: Jhonatan Goblin

entityData.name: Laser Llama
entityData.description: A nimble robot that zips around the battlefield, unleashing a devastating barrage of laser fire on any enemy foolish enough to cross its path. With lightning-fast reflexes and precision targeting, the Laser Llama is the perfect companion for any high-tech commando.
entityData.title: Jhonatan Goblin
